thread.section_title: NZ Rockshop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NZ Rockshop | rockshop.co.nz
thread.title: Jono Gillespie
thread.title_full: NZ Rockshop reviewed by Jono Gillespie

author: Jono Gillespie
title: Jono Gillespie
text:
Every time I've been into the Rockshop, no matter the goal, I have been treated with the utmost respect and kindness from all the staff I have met. They're always willing to help and always have answers to the questions I have.
The store is always set up to look very tidy and organised and it is my first stop for anything music related.
